text: Kar danganir Israelia Aronɨn ovavir boriba bagha mɨsevezir nguibar ekiabar ziaba: Aron, a Kohatɨn ikɨzimɨn gumazim. Israelia fomɨra, nguibaba tuiragh Livain anabamɨn adarazir anɨngsɨ satu gikararava kamaghɨn fogh suam, men ikɨzimɨn aven terara faragh nguibam iniam. Ezɨ Aronɨn adarazir ziam faragha oto.
